# arrowsPosition

**Instance Property**

The location of the scroll buttons within the scroller, as described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/ArrowPosition].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var arrowsPosition: NSScroller.ArrowPosition { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/ArrowPosition] for a list of possible values for `location`.
title: arrowsPosition
